content.text: Read and listen to the conversation between these two students. Identify questions, intonation and how they pronounce verbs in simple past.
content.name: MMI7

content.text: Kid 1: Hi, Alfred. How were your holidays?
content.name: abc1

content.text: Kid 2: Hi, Janice. It was great. I went to the beach with my family. We had a lot of fun.
content.name: cba2

content.text: Kid 1: That sounds nice. What did you do at the beach?
content.name: dex1

content.text: Kid 2: We swam, played soccer, built sandcastles, and ate ice cream. I loved it.
content.name: edc2

content.text: Kid 1: I’m glad you enjoyed it. I also had a good holiday.
content.name: qwe1

content.text: Kid 2: Really? What did you do?
content.name: epa2

content.text: Kid 1: I visited my grandparents in the countryside. They have a farm with many animals.
content.name: plm1

content.text: Kid 2: Wow, that’s cool. What kind of animals do they have?
content.name: asw2

content.text: Kid 1: They have cows, chickens, pigs, horses, lambs, and a dog. I helped them feed the animals, collected the eggs, washed the dishes and I also rode a horse for the first time.
content.name: xsw1

content.text: Kid 2: That sounds fun. Did you like riding a horse?
content.name: mnz2

content.text: Kid 1: Yes, I loved it. I was a bit scaring at first, but then I got used to it. The horse was very gentle and friendly.
content.name: kjh1

content.text: Kid 2: I’m happy for you. It sounds like you had a great time.
content.name: tre2

content.text: Kid 1: I did. It was very different from the life in the city. I learned a lot from my grandparents.
content.name: qaz1

content.text: Kid 2: That’s awesome. Maybe we can go there together someday.
content.name: pol2

content.text: Kid 1: Sure, that would be nice. I’m sure they would love to meet you.
content.name: mko1

content.text: Kid 2: Me too. Well, I guess we should go to class now.
content.name: zxc2

content.text: Kid 1: Yeah, let’s go. See you later.
content.name: dfg1

content.text: Kid 2: See you later. Bye.
content.name: rty2

content.text: Congratulations, you finished the activity.
content.name: Congra
